title: Watch the prologue for Doctor Who series 9
content:
With a week to go until its return, the BBC has debuted a two minute prologue to the ninth series of Doctor Who , which you can watch right here… 
 
SEE ALSO: River Song returning for Doctor Who Christmas Special, synopsis released 
 
  
 
Doctor Who series 9 gets underway on BBC One on September 19th with the premiere episode ‘The Magician’s Apprentice’. Follow all of our Doctor Who coverage here .
